Introduction
This topic contains information on requesting field examinations, including
when to request a field examination
how to request a field examination
handling requests for medical, social, or industrial history
facilitating identification ofÂ a person concerned in a claim
routing field examination requests
, and
handling a request for a foreign field examination
.
title: M21-1, Part X, Subpart v, Chapter 1, Section E  - Requests for Field Examinations
citation: Part X, Subpart v, Chapter 1, Section E
